about_the_game:
DragonSpiritsINFight
DragonSpiritsINFight is an idle card-building game, serving as a spin-off to Dragon Spirits: Academy Adventures. It boasts a simple interface resembling a regular program and features practical functions like a Pomodoro timer, making it the perfect way to unwind during work breaks.

Background

The peace of the Dragon Spirits Islands has been shattered! Years later, a mysterious and polluting D.S. Field has swept in, making the Dragon Spirits stronger, but weakening the Pacts between Pact Sealers and the dragons. Even worse, unknown monsters have started appearing!
You, a graduate of the Dragon Spirits Academy, join a local guild and take on the responsibility of investigating the truth. As you explore, you will rediscover how to command Dragon Spirits in battle in this new D.S. Field environment and solve the troubles faced by the people, guarding the peace of the islands.
Game Features:
• Mysterious Polluting D.S. Field: Changes the fate of the Dragon Spirits, and brings new challenges.
• More Powerful Dragon Spirits: Break through the level cap and build your own Dragon Spirits team.
• New Battle System: Pre-build your battle strategies, enjoy automatic combat, and experience a new combat style.
• Unknown Monsters Attack: Full of unknown challenges, testing your strategy and tactics.
• Rediscover the Glory of Battle: Start from scratch, grow amidst the crisis, and become a true Pact Sealer.

Gameplay

Collect Dragon Spirits, combine skills, and become the strongest Pact Sealer!
• A new battle system using cost + deck building, combining strategy and skill!
• Real-time combat against other players, with card activation and strategic decision-making!
• Challenge single-player levels, collect resources, and hone your skills.
• Upload your deck, compete in the ladder, and fight for ranking.
• Explore mysterious maps, collect treasures, skills, and Dragon Spirits, and unlock even more possibilities.
• Integrate with the Pomodoro timer to seamlessly connect the game with your work and life, creating an efficient lifestyle!
